Articles.Content:
Yup, if that pencil includes a chainsaw, with which to slice you to pieces

The next person to post is dumb

Nupe!

The user below me can't use violence against me because I'm in Jeb Mode (God Mode).

Yep!

Next poster loves Pink Floyd music.

Wanna bet? *Revs up chainsaw*

The person below is my target

Denied. *mysterious cloak swoosh, fades into the shadows*

The person below me also appears somewhere above me.

true (drop pods will rain like a storm from the heavens that destroys everything in its wake)

the user below me plays space marines

Nope

The user below me wants to hack me

maybe...

the user below me knows too much...

bout' dem ninja's.
what? no... what are you talking about there is no war in Ba Sing Se...

Dear Mr. Brian,

I cannot answer your question as it is nonexistent.

Signed,

~ Mr. Flymetothemun

The person below me wishes that Mister Eleven J. Ridding would answer the questions posed to him in a civilized and honest way in place of using answers involving the use of sharp weapons and tools.

I don't know who that is... but less sharp weapons would be nice.

The person below me is Brian, and he's going to post a question.

false

(the suer below me won't read this...)

false i can read it

the user below me thinks the user below me posted nothing and i got ninja'd

um... I'm pretty sure I didn't ninja you.

The user below me uses Altoids as rocket fuel.

False I use peanut butter.

The user below me likes steam engines.

Dear Mr. Guarn,

I am very perplexed and amazed by both the steam locomotive and the steam engine. Therefore, the answer to your question would yes.

Signed,

~Flymetothemun

The next person of viewership shall agree that the Internal Combustion Engine is also an amazing and intriguing piece of craftsmanship and mechanical prowess.

Why yes, I do wholesomely agr *knock knock knock knock knock knock knock knock knock*.... got tammit Nappa....

The user below has flown a plane... not into the ground!

Dear Mr. Deltac,

I have not operated an Aircraft during the course of my life. However, I have ridden in 4 jet aircraft and 2 propeller aircraft. Though I would like to obtain a Private Pilot license during my life, but it is not something of grave importance.

Signed,

~Flymetothemun

The next person of viewership owns a legally-obtained and operational Shortwave-band radio receiver and listens to radio transmissions received by said receiver on a regular basis.

Edited November 16, 2013 by Flymetothemun

I only wish!

The user below me is very professional!

Dear Mr. Austin,

While I do like to write in a professional manner, I cannot claim to be a professional in any field. Also, you can purchase a quality Shortwave-band radio receiver at a low price, but to transmit on Shortwave frequencies, I believe that you must get a Ham radio license and the necessary equipment. I am currently in pursuit of a Ham radio license here in America, albeit at a very slow pace.

Signed,

~Flymetothemun

The next person of viewership shall agree that Mr. Austin's spelling of "Russian" under his user-name is wrong and should be corrected to reflect the true spelling of his apparent Motherland.

True

Its a small ironic mistake

The user below me is eating a cookie

Sadly, no.

The user below me has suffered in the April forum porge

Since I joined today, unless the forum porge is going to happpen again, then no.

The user below me is bald.

Noooope. Just got a haircut tho.

User below is a kerbal.

N-.... maybe.

The user below me has the Steam version, and original version of KSP.
